title: Development & Integration | Digital Stores Development Services
content:
# Development & Integration | Digital Stores Development Services

Comprehensive development and integration services by a leading digital stores development company for your development, migration, UI/UX, and third-party integration needs on leading digital experience platforms


Back To Services Development & Integration Services Overview Features, functions, and flexibility - connecting digital dots for experience-centric development and integration solutions. At Krish, we help businesses improve their brand experience (BX) with experience-driven solutions designed for improved ROI. With platform-agnostic capabilities and a powerful partner ecosystem, we devise a strategy that enables immersive digital experiences at scale. Here, your DXP vision becomes a striking reality with customized, cost-effective, and customer-first digital solutions. Tell us the BX story you want to build, and we will work with you to convert it into a bestselling digital book! Schedule a Call Development Services An array of experience-centric digital store development services designed to help your business grow every step of the way. From choosing the right digital experience platform to build or migrate to optimizing the performance and offering support, we have got you covered. Stores/Sites Development We are here to turn your commerce vision into a blazing reality Flexible Architecture Better Business Agility Engaging Shopping Experience Streamlined Checkout Flawless Coding & Greater Scalability Platform Migration Your hassle-free, seamless, and secure platform migration partner Relaunching Evaluation of existing built Platform feature rebuilding Perform QA & Optimization Data Assessment & Migration strategy UI/UX Exceptional shopping experience with customer-first designs Prototyping & wireframe crafting Building and branding guidelines Mapping the customer journey Conversion Rate Optimization Responsive & Mobile-friendly Design System Integrations Fuel your operations with feature-rich extensions and integrations Perform integrations Identifying the data-touch points Identifying the data flows Defining the integration architecture Defining the integration trigger type - Real-time/periodic Performance Optimization Boost CRO with optimized store performance and improved agility Caching & CDN Bundle and Minification Optimized and improved store performance Removing duplicate code JS & CSS Using a minimalistic styling Framework Managed Support Regular and relentless Managed support when you need the most Security Updates Server Monitoring Strategic Consultations Digital Marketing Audit Technical & Hosting Audit DXP Integration Services Power up your digital experience platform (DXP) functionalities with integrations that align with your present and future needs. We can help you customize integrations to build a feature-rich digital store that fuels seamless digital experiences. ERP ODOO ERP Paper Bricks Oracle NetSuite SAP B1 and SAP HANA Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central CRM Capillary Zoho Quickbook Salesforce Odoo CRM Sugar CRM OMS Vinculum System Zoho OMS Linnworks NetSuite StitchLabs BrightPearl POS Connect POS Acid POS Ebizmarts POS Consultmosaic POS Lightspeed POS PIM Pimcore Akeneo PIM Inriver PIM Salsify Bluestone Payment PayPal RazorPay Knet Network International Cc Avenue Shipping UPS USPS DHL Aramex LastMile Marketing Channels DotDigital Mailchimp Klaviyo Bluecore GA Analytics Let's Get Started Our work in action B2C D2C Middle East & Africa Food & Beverage Unlocking the power of safe drinking water leveraging eCommerce View Case Study B2C D2C Middle East & Africa Consumer Goods Transforming UAE's Largest Consumer Cooperative with Superior CX Capabilities View Case Study B2C D2C North America Health & Beauty BioIQ creating healthy customer experience with digital amplification View Case Study Frequently Asked Questions Which digital store development services do you offer? Krish delivers an unparalleled digital store development experience to its clients by crafting top-tier online storefronts with the help of our experienced team. We develop engaging and user-friendly experiences using a customer-first approach to build CX-ready digital stores. Our digital store development services include consulting for a new platform, building the UI, adding features and functionalities to support the business, flexible deployment options, technical support, third-party applications, and enhanced security. Connect with our experts to know about end-to-end digital experience solutions. What does Krish offer in terms of Integration services? We offer an extensive range of DXP integrations that cover all your requirements. Everything is integrated, from sales information to your siteâ€™s content to shipping and payment, to give you better control over your digital experiences. With a team of seasoned developers, web designers, and enterprise software experts, we are an agency capable of addressing all your needs. Whether your platform needs to integrate with your ERP, CRM, OMS, POS, PIM, Payment, Shipping, and 3rd Party Marketplaces, we can work with you to get the data connected seamlessly. What is the cost of digital store development and integration services? Development of a new store is once in a lifetime investment and thus, it is important to strategically chalk out all the development stages. The cost estimations can vary depending on the platform you choose, the hosting provider you select, the size of your inventory, the geographies you want to target, and the functionalities you want to integrate. Contact our development & integration experts to discuss your digital vision and get the quote as per the solution discovery. Why should I trust Krish as a development and integration partner? With 20+ years of industry experience working on varied platforms and system integrations, we are a go-to development & integration service partner delivering user-friendly, search engine optimized, and mobile-friendly solutions. We are platform-agnostic and have experts for multiple DXPs including, but not limited to Adobe Commerce, Shopify, commercetools, and VTEX. With 350+ successful projects, we hold the prowess needed to build an exceptional digital experience for your business. Trusted by leading brands
